Test.Name: There in no Credential service
Test.Description: DUT sends GetServices response without Credential service

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: Credential service: NOT SUPPORTED Credential subfeatures: NOT SUPPORTED Other feature request is out of scope

Test.Name: Credential service (all features supported)
Test.Description: DUT sends GetServices response with Credential service (all features supported)

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: Credential service: SUPPORTED pt:Card SUPPORTED pt:PIN SUPPORTED pt:Fingerprint SUPPORTED pt:Face SUPPORTED pt:Iris SUPPORTED pt:Vein SUPPORTED Credential Validity SUPPORTED Credential Access Profile Validity SUPPORTED Validity Supports Time Value SUPPORTED Reset Antipassback Violation SUPPORTED
